original_title: Changing ministers will not solve health sector  problems: Namal
original_body_lines: MP Namal Rajapaksa said an investigation should be held and legal action taken if there have been wrongdoings in the country’s health sector.
He was commenting on the controversy surrounding medicinal drug imports to Sri Lanka.
"A firm stance must be taken, as this is not the first time this issue has surfaced," he said.
Asked if the Health Minister must be replaced, MP Rajapaksa said that a change of ministers will not solve the problems.
